org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group
类 ProcessMove

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group.ProcessMove
所有已实现的接口：
java.lang.Runnable
public class ProcessMove
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class is used for change regionserver group property

It will move all regions off a regionserver ,and then move into other regionserver left on this group.

构造方法摘要
ProcessMove(java.util.Set<MoveGroupPlan> movegroupPlanset, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> grouppropertymap, HMaster master, java.lang.String currentdir)
          Construct method for thread
 
方法摘要
 void run()
          Move all regions and update configuration and librarys
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

ProcessMove

public ProcessMove(java.util.Set<MoveGroupPlan> movegroupPlanset,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> grouppropertymap,
                   HMaster master,
                   java.lang.String currentdir)
Construct method for thread

参数：
movegroupPlanset - Set<MoveGroupPlan> , Will change regionserver plan set
groupmap - Map < String, List< String >> , key:groupname , value: regionserver name list
grouppropertymap - Map< String, Boolean > , key : groupname ,value : isSpecialConfiguration
master - Master Interface
currentdir - current context dir path
方法详细信息

run

public void run()
Move all regions and update configuration and librarys

指定者：
接口 java.lang.Runnable 中的 run
